                                                                           int edge)
        scale a set of points transforming them to coordinates within the display scale
        Parameters:
        points - the list of point for inclusion in the scaling computations
        scaleFactors - a scale factor point to use transforming the display data
        edge - the pixel size of an edge of the chart
        Returns:
        a transformed set of points
